Interface playn.core.Layer

Changed Methods
float alpha() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Return the global alpha value for this layer.
float depth() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns this layer's current depth.
void destroy() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Destroys this layer, removing it from its parent layer.
boolean destroyed() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Whether this layer has been destroyed.
Layer hitTest(Point) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Tests whether the supplied (layer relative) point "hits" this layer or any of its children.
Layer hitTestDefault(Point) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Like .hitTest except that it ignores a configured HitTester.
boolean interactive() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns true if this layer reacts to clicks and touches.

float originY() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns the y-component of the layer's origin.

float scaleX() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns this layer's current scale in the x direction.
float scaleY() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns this layer's current scale in the y direction.

Layer setOrigin(float, float) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Sets the origin of the layer.

Layer setScaleX(float) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Sets the current x scale of this layer.
Layer setScaleY(float) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Sets the current y scale of this layer.

Layer setTint(int) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Sets the tint for this layer, as {@code ARGB}.
Layer setTranslation(float, float) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Sets the x and y translation of this layer.
Layer setTx(float) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Sets the x translation of this layer.
Layer setTy(float) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Sets the y translation of this layer.
Layer setVisible(boolean) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Configures this layer's visibility: if true, it will be rendered as normal, if false it and its children will not be rendered.
int tint() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns the current tint for this layer, as {@code ARGB}.

float tx() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns this layer's current translation in the x direction.

Connection addListener(LayerListener) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Registers a listener with this layer that will be notified if a touch event happens within its bounds.
